subject: RE: [Read_Alphabet] Licensing for Jerome and Ghoti fonts
msgSnippet: Relax, my friend.  I created Jerome as a gift to the Shavian community. Enjoy! / JerOm z f  Yl ! Shalom v Tovah, Jon My Website URL: www.frimmin.com
messageBody:
Message
Relax, my friend.  I created Jerome as a gift to the Shavian community.  Enjoy!

/ JerOm z f  Yl !

 

Shalom v'Tovah,

Jon    
My Website URL: www.frimmin.com
*****************************************************
It is more necessary to love much than to think much;
always do that which impels you most to love.

        --St. Teresa of Avila, The Interior Castle

-----Original Message-----
From: rmgburke [mailto:rmgb@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 01, 2002 1:02 PM
To: Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Read_Alphabet] Licensing for Jerome and Ghoti fonts

I'm sure I've missed it somewhere, but does anyone know the licensing restrictions (if any) for the Jerome and Ghoti fonts? After I get better at the Read alphabet, I'd like to write a little help guide for beginners to learn it. However, I'd hate to run into any legal problems if I use Jerome.

Thanks!
